nodes.text: Broadberry Meadow was a secluded cliff and riverside garden located in the capital city Theed on the planet Naboo by the year 32 BBY. The garden contained a hexagonal building with beige walls and a domed green roof built amongst the grass and trees of the meadow. A path wrapped around the meadow along the riverbank, connecting to a jetty. Due to its location on the cliff edge, the island containing Broadberry Meadow could only be reached by boat.

Broadberry Meadow was first shown in the Star Wars Legends reference book Inside the Worlds of Star Wars: Episode I, which was written by Kristin Lund, illustrated by Richard Chasemore and Hans Jenssen, and released on October 1, 2000. The image of the garden was then reprinted as part of the canon Star Wars: Complete Locations reference book released on September 27, 2016.
